chapter.verse: .... jah qa alla gamains: amen. jah hazidedun fraujan jah gatawidedun ata waurd alla so managei.

jah fram amma daga ei anabau mis ei weisjau fauramaleis ize in Iudaia, fram jera .k. und jer .l. jah anar Arta[r]ksairksaus iudanis .ib. jera, ik jah brorjus meinai hlaif fauramaleis meinis ni matidedum.

i fauramaljos aiei weisun faura mis kauridedun o managein jah nemun at im hlaibans jah wein jah nauhanuh silubris sikle .m., jah skalkos ize fraujinodedun izai managein; i ik ni tawida swa faura andwairja agisis gudis.
jah waurstw izos baurgswaddjaus inswindia, jah aurp ni gastaistald, jah iwos meinai jah allai ai galisanans du amma waurstwa.
jah ludaieis jah ai fauramaljos .r. jah .n. gumane jah ai qimandans at unsis us iudom aim bisunjane unsis ana biuda meinamma andnumanai weisun.

jah was fraquman dagis hwizuh stiur .a. lamba gawalida .q. jah gaits [.a.] gamanwida was mis; jah bi .i. dagans gaf wein allai izai filusnai jah allai izai managein; jah ana o alla hlaif fauramaleis meinis ni sokida, in is ei ni kauridedjau o managein in aim waurstwam . . . .
jah ustauhana war so baurgswaddjus .e. jah .k. daga menois Alulis, .n. dage jah .b.
jah war, swe hausidedun fiands unsarai allai, jah ohtedun allos iudos os bisunjane unsis, jah atdraus agis in augona ize abraba; jah ufkunedun atei fram guda unsaramma war usfulli ata waurstw.
jah in dagam jainaim managai weisun ize reikjane Iudaie, aiei sandidedun aipistulans du Tobeiin, jah Tobeias du im.
managai auk in Iudaia ufaijai weisun imma, unte megs was Saixaineiins, sunaus Aieirins, jah Ioanan sunus is nam dauhtar Maisaullamis, sunaus Barakeiins, du qenai.
jah rodidedun du imma waila in andwairja meinamma, jah waurda meina spillodedun imma, jah aipistulans insandida Tobeias ogjan mik.
Jah warp, swe gatimrida warp so baurgswaddjus, jah gasatida haurdins, jah gaweisodai waurun daurawardos jah liuarjos jah Laiwweiteis;
jah anabaup Anaiin bropr meinamma jah Ananeiin fauramaplja baurgs Iairusalems, unte sa was wair sunjeins jah ogands fraujan ufar managans;
jah qap im: ni uslukaindau daurons Iairusalems, und atei urrinnai sunno . . . .
sunaus Azeiris, sunaus Aizaikeiins, niuntehund jah .h.
suniwe Gabaons .*. .e. suniwe Bilaihaimis .r. .k. .g. suniwe Naitofaeis .r. .i. .q.
waire Kareiaiaareim jah Kaifaira jah Bero .hw. .m. .g.
jah gudjans: sunjus Aidduins us garda Iesuis niun hunda .u. .g.
jah Laiwweiteis: sunjus Iesuis jah Kaidmeielis us sunum Odueiins .u. .d.
sunjus daurawarde: sunaus Sailaumis jah sunjus Aze . . . .
